name: Current Meter - Typical
description: Suitable for most environments, high temporal resolution with moderate filtering. 12+ month typical battery life.

name: Current Meter - Swells
description: Recommended for locations with swells with a period of up to 10 seconds. 12+ month typical battery life.

name: Current Meter - Energetic/Turbulence
description: Recommended for areas near surf zones or other very turbulent locations. 6+ month typical battery life.

name: General Logging - Continuous Recording
description: Data logging at 16Hz continuously.  3+ month typical battery life.

name: General Logging - Burst Recording
description: Data logging at 16 Hz, 1 minute ON, 4 minutes OFF.  12+ month typical battery life.
